website_summaries.verdict: A popular brand that has a lot of fans and mixed reviews – works well for some eye shapes, but it has some flaws.
pros: Has a shape that works well for smaller eyes and hard-to-curl lashes
cons: May be too curved for some eye shapes
Fans of Shiseido curlers have griped that it doesn't seem as well-made as previous models

customer_reviews.title: NOT REAL
customer_reviews.text: I had an actual shiseido eye lash curler from sephora. I lost it and needed a new one. I saw that it was on amazon so ordered it because it would get here faster. It does not work well at all and is very obvi not a real one. You also can not return the item.Pretty much $15 down the drain.
customer_reviews.author: Kaylee

customer_reviews.title: Bringing your estranged eye-lashes and eye-brows together again!
customer_reviews.text: My lashes and their long distant friend-hairs above them know as my eyebrows have never been able to hang-out like this before! I have some very lazy home-body lashes. But this curler in combination with Kiss Me heroine make Mascara have curled and kept these girls at attention for 12 hours. That has never been a reality for me. If your lashes and eyebrows would like to finally high-five each other buy this- thank me later ;)
customer_reviews.author: amoment4myself

customer_reviews.title: Definitely great for Asian eyes
customer_reviews.text: The average drug store eyelash curlers are catered towards a certain eye shape. I've tried a couple of those brands and they always miss the ends of my eyelashes or crimp them instead of curl them. I am Chinese so my eyes are shaped differently than the average white girl. After reading several reviews, I decided to go with a more expensive brand that's aimed towards my eye shape. I tried it the first time and was impressed by the results. It curled my lashes really well and I will never go back to another brand.
customer_reviews.author: elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I am caucasian with almond shaped lids and very stubby to nonexistentlashes and any eyelash curler I have ever tried pinches my eyelids & never holds the curl. These are PERFECTLY fit to my eyes and do not pinch at all! I even tried the other brand similar to these also begins with S and the were a little longer width & flatter so they pinched my outer lid. These are the perfect length & curvature for my lids & the 3 extra refills that came with them definitely made it worth the price. Will def order again when needed...sorry for the awful pics lol
customer_reviews.author: NIKKI

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn't buy again
customer_reviews.text: I have Asian eyes so when I clamp closer to my lid it pinches. Not sure if its bc of my eye shape but this brand was most recommended for asain eyes. I do like that it gave me extra inserts. I use another brand sold at target and it doesn't use pinch my eye. I would return this one and get the target brand but it wasn't an option. I decided to try a heated eyelash curler and I just got it and love it!
customer_reviews.author: Izabish

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money... Does not work for me
customer_reviews.text: I'm 100% Asian & this did not work for me. It pinches my eyelids, doesn't get all my eyelashes & doesn't curl at all! Plus, I only got one extra refill pad not the extra package of 2 as pictured. It's very flimsy & made cheaply. Definitely a waste of money since I won't ever be using it. I just use waterproof mascara & get better results than using this product which is nothing.
customer_reviews.author: LoveAmazon

customer_reviews.title: Seems counterfeit, not genuine.
customer_reviews.text: The one I got from Amazon was completely different from the Shiseido eyelash curler I ordered from Ulta. I ordered from Amazon first. When the one I ordered on Amazon arrived, I was suspicious of the packaging and the color of the eyelash curler since my previous Shiseido curler was a very dark grey not a stainless steel color. I then ordered one from Ulta and the one from Ulta matched my old Shiseido curler. The one from Amazon feels too loose when I open and close it and seems to be a cheap Chinese knockoff.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: I was stupid and didn't test out the curler completely before using it on my eyelashes. The product was bent in a way that the clamp went behind the rubber on the bottom and completely cut off my lashes right in the middle of my eye. Please pray for me..
customer_reviews.author: brandon

customer_reviews.title: Not a great fit for flat eyes. Doesn't pinch, but sharp edges make it a pain to use.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Comes with 4 pads total. Good for the price. Cons: Feels kinda cheap compared to the $20 gunmetal grey Shiseido curler; less solid feeling. Like if you shook it, you'd expect it to tinkle because of loose parts or something, but otherwise sturdy enough. Other comments: If you have smaller, flatter eyes, this is NOT for you. Will dig into the corners of your eyes. It would be tolerable if the edges of the curler were filed down smooth, instead of being a little sharp. Think it's a great deal for people whose eyes are rounder.
customer_reviews.author: jj

customer_reviews.title: Only curler that works for almond eyes
customer_reviews.text: This is the best thing ever for almond-shaped eyes! I’m Chinese American and most of the commercial eyelash curlers are so round and deep-set that they do not grasp and curl my eyelashes. This product actually gives me a curl. I don’t even have to use the hairdryer to heat up the curler to help hold the curl. I have straight m, thick lashes, so the Shisheido curler paired with a waterproof mascara (I read the waterproof formulas tend to hold a curl better) are my go-to eye makeup items.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Dissatisfied
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately I believe the curler I received is a fake. I’ve bought this exact curler for years and have had great results. This one I most recently purchased does not produce any curl, even after extended amounts of time curling.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Perkins

customer_reviews.title: Item came bent and completely out of the box. ...
customer_reviews.text: Item came bent and completely out of the box. The curler couldn't close all the way. I compared it to my friend's curler she got a Sephora and this one seemed more curved. Returned and will get my curler from an actual store.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: I’m so used to having an eyelash curler that open wide. Although this one is designed for Asian eyes, I feel it doesn’t get ALL my lashes, but it does get quite a good bit of it. I saw one at Sephora, same brand, and the curve is actually a little wider than this. Should’ve bought it in person.
customer_reviews.author: MagicintheAir

customer_reviews.title: ... product because I have used it before and really like it. I didn't pay attention to the fact ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product because I have used it before and really like it. I didn't pay attention to the fact that it would be coming from Japan! It took over a month to get to me but the product is great. Next time I will look for someone closer.
customer_reviews.author: Cinemares

customer_reviews.title: Awesome curler
customer_reviews.text: I'm Asian so I have a different eye shape than most and all my old curlers didn't fit right. They used to always pinch my skin and I just thought I was using the curlers wrong like the Revlon eye curler. But when I got this curler, I thought it was a miracle! No more pinched skin! Its a lot flatter than a typical curler and the rubber is durable. It was also nice that it came with a refill set and even an extra one in the original packaging. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: Did not like this curler
customer_reviews.text: This did nothing for my eyelashes. Extremely disappointed. Not sure if it’s a knockoff or what, but for the price and reviews I’ve read on google, this should have curled my lashes
customer_reviews.author: patty harmon

customer_reviews.title: Great Eye Lash Curler!
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know what it is about this eye lash curler but I’ve been using this for years and still love it. You don’t have to stretch your eye lashes. This product curls your lashes, it doesn’t crimp them.
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: I have pretty long and thick eye lashes
customer_reviews.text: I have pretty long and thick eye lashes. I bought so many eye lash curlers because they wouldn't last. Some of them weren't curling my lashes, some of them kept pulling my lashes out, some of them were curling my lashes unevenly. But with this shiseido lash curler, my lashes were curling evenly, stayed all day curled, and not pulling out my lashes. I still have to curl a few times every time whem i curl my lashes but once i do that, they just stay like that all day. No need to mascara my lashes. Still stay up.
customer_reviews.author: Helen B.

customer_reviews.title: great curler for asian lashes
customer_reviews.text: japanese eyelash curler is an essencial for asian girls! do it before you use the mascara! Love this curler, not sure the additional refill will come into use anytime soon tho.
customer_reviews.author: YIPING W.

customer_reviews.title: Makes a noticeable difference in eye-lash curl!
customer_reviews.text: Who would think that a simple eye-lash curler would make such a difference!? I think this one is better than most because it is wide enough to cover the entire length of my eye-lid. So it gets even those short, slight eye-lashes at the very outer corner of my eyes making the curl seem fuller and thicker. I'm using the same mascara but can see the difference between Shiseido (new) and the Revlon (old). Wondering why I waited so long? I like this one too, because I can buy replacement rubber parts!
customer_reviews.author: lindamia

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Boxed smashed when delivered, package eye lash curler was in dented, damaged eye lash curler. And cheap quality. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: MN

customer_reviews.title: OMG I heard this curler is one of the best curlers for Asian eyes
customer_reviews.text: OMG I heard this curler is one of the best curlers for Asian eyes. I only had cheap curler and now I know why this brand curler is so famous in Asian countries. They curled my lashes perfectly! I have very straight lashes that grow little downward but after I used this, even my sister was amazed. It is little pricey but after buying the curler you can just buy the refills later which is less expensive. I think it's a good deal to have three extra refills.I don't really do mascara that much except for special occasions (it ruins my lashes) so I think it'll last long. So far love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It captures + curls every lash in a gentle press, without pinching or tugging on your lashes.
customer_reviews.text: It captures + curls every lash in a gentle press, without pinching or tugging on your lashes.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Go

customer_reviews.title: Works, But Not As Well As Before
customer_reviews.text: I received the Shiseido eyelash curler with three refills, but something doesn't seem quite like I've used in the past. Usually the curler is more tight with a curl because it's new. This seemed a little too flexible for first time use and didn't curl my eyelashes as well. The pads all seem brand new, but this isn't the quality I'm used to using.
customer_reviews.author: BB

customer_reviews.title: I used to work in a makeup store and everyone always asked me what eyelash curler I used and this was the one I recommended. It
customer_reviews.text: I bought my first Shiseido eyelash curler when I was in high school and used it for 4 years. It was time for a new one. I used to work in a makeup store and everyone always asked me what eyelash curler I used and this was the one I recommended. It will give you the perfect curl and is great for many different eye shapes (especially Asian). It will curl stubborn straight lashes.
customer_reviews.author: Koda

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT for Asian eyes!
customer_reviews.text: It so much better than regular lash curlers, of which I have had MANY. This one is by far the best for my eye lashes. Wish I had discovered it decades ago!
customer_reviews.author: bets

customer_reviews.title: Useless
customer_reviews.text: I've used Shiseido eyelash curlers for years. I ordered this as a back up and just tried to use it. It was still in the original packing from the seller and Amazon. It is clearly defective. The handles touch when in use and it doesn't provide any curl whatsoever. Extremely disappointed and would like a refund or credit.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Its ok
customer_reviews.text: It took a long time to receive this item and it does not open as wide as most eyelash curler’s do.
customer_reviews.author: Tammie Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: Faulty product
customer_reviews.text: I’m really disappointed how my lash curler came in. The curler itself had been to an unflattering angle, making it uncomfortable and inconvenient to use. I expect a refund of my money and if you should cover the shipping expenses to get the product back.
customer_reviews.author: Rujin Chen

customer_reviews.title: Good refills!
customer_reviews.text: This isn’t the same Shiseido curler from Ulta or Sephora BUT it has 4 rubber refill pads that does fit the “real” curler. Those sell for $6 each @ Sephora. This is a good deal just for the refills- IMO.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Talbot

customer_reviews.title: Beware
customer_reviews.text: I got a fake one as well. I usually buy mine at Macy's but decided to buy this one. Big mistake.
customer_reviews.author: A. Ortega

customer_reviews.title: Nice cushion. Sad packaging was not recyclable
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Nice cushion. Sad packaging was not recyclable, came in the paper and plastic envelope instread of the new plastic one that can be recycled.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: It fits my asian eyes, finally! Still pinches ...
customer_reviews.text: It fits my asian eyes, finally! Still pinches a little, but a step up from all the other ones on the market.
customer_reviews.author: Vivian Z

customer_reviews.title: Don't recommend
customer_reviews.text: This eyelash curler literally plucked pretty much all of my already short n sparse lashes on my eyes off after using and I made sure to change the padding. This started happing about 2 months into using this. NOT WORTH IT. Edit: I also noticed the eyelash curler isn’t leveled. So when I squeeze the eyelash curler, the left side was less squeezed together than the right. So it was much harder to curl my left eye than my right eye.
customer_reviews.author: Violet

customer_reviews.title: Gentle to my eyelids
customer_reviews.text: Great! It doesn't pinch as much as other eyelash curlers I've used. Sometimes it misses some eyelashes but that's probably more due to my poor technique and my fear of pinching myself.
customer_reviews.author: Euna Kim

customer_reviews.title: No more pinching!
customer_reviews.text: Love this eyelash curler! I was sick of pinching my eye lids with my old curler. When I read the reviews about this one, I decided to give it a try and it works great! I get a good curl without the pain/pinch!
customer_reviews.author: Abby B

customer_reviews.title: Just a nice and simple eyelash curler
customer_reviews.text: Just a nice and simple eyelash curler! Works very well, however I have not tried any other eyelash curler. So, I can't really give a proper point of reference!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: really like it so far
customer_reviews.text: Curls my eyelashes the first time, really like it so far!!!
customer_reviews.author: Laurie E

customer_reviews.title: I like the fit and the rubber cushion
customer_reviews.text: Item as described and delivered in a timely manner. I like the fit and the rubber cushion. Nice curl.
customer_reviews.author: Dory West

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for asian eyelashes so if you got some almond ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for asian eyelashes so if you got some almond shaped eyes you'll love this! It curls so well and my eyes look like there are diamonds sparkling from within no joke homegirls
customer_reviews.author: junie

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: The handles are loose and do not curl as good as others.
customer_reviews.author: Aamir

customer_reviews.title: Probably passing this on to a friend.
customer_reviews.text: I think this would work better for eyes that protrude a little bit because I had to angle this upwards to make sure that it gets all my lashes. This doesn't lay flat on my eyelids so the front part of it is way too far when I try to curl normally.
customer_reviews.author: kriz02

customer_reviews.title: Good product definitely worth the price
customer_reviews.text: I have used it for a while before I write this review. Good product definitely worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Chien Feng

customer_reviews.title: Fits smaller eye sockets and straight lashes
customer_reviews.text: My lashes are very straight and the rubber strip is much softer than shu uemera curler. With multiple tries, my lashes are curled well and last better too.
customer_reviews.author: Elisabeth Chin

customer_reviews.title: Sucks!
customer_reviews.text: Rip off. Must be a knock off. While squeezing it , the metal part that your fingers go through crossed as if I had been using it for 6 months or more. Did nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Popham

customer_reviews.title: but overall it works better than other brands
customer_reviews.text: This is very expensive and the replacement pads don't stay in place, but overall it works better than other brands.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: eyelash curler
customer_reviews.text: this was to replace another eyelash curler. for some reason, doesn't do the job.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy M.

customer_reviews.title: a little overpriced
customer_reviews.text: Decent quality. I'd rather go with a cheaper one that has a wider curler for the eyelashes. Sometimes this one doesn't get all my lashes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far its the best eyelash curler I have used I never knew my ...
customer_reviews.text: So far its the best eyelash curler I have used I never knew my eyelashes where long until this product! I highly recommend and would buy this again!
customer_reviews.author: Montano

customer_reviews.title: Eyelash Curler Fiaally
customer_reviews.text: 4 stars because it took weeks for delivery but arrived in good shape and works well. Just as described.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: I love it! And the others I have tried were ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the only eyelash curler I will buy. I love it! And the others I have tried were terrible.
customer_reviews.author: njc

customer_reviews.title: Never buying another brand again
customer_reviews.text: This is the best eyelash curler! Doesn't pinch and doesn't take a lot of effort or attention. Never buying another brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Southworth

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this! Works great doesn't pinch and is a great shape for my almond eyes.
customer_reviews.author: shrmpfriedrice

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to shape my eyelash, beautiful flower shape, the only thing is the price is twice than in Japanese.
customer_reviews.author: Gin

customer_reviews.title: Finally
customer_reviews.text: Great curler! It took me a long time to find an eyelash curler that doesn't rip my eye lashes out, or get so sticky or corroded that they stick to it. This works perfectly and is really gentle on my lashes.
customer_reviews.author: shopper4life

customer_reviews.title: Long-lasting eyelash curl
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't pull/pinch my eyelashes. I didn't realize that I fit makes all the difference! The curl holds up very well...even after I wash off my make up. A really great product at a great value - with two refills, so three altogether.
customer_reviews.author: Bruins84

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Get's almost every lash but holds a curl ALL DAY
customer_reviews.author: HotDog

customer_reviews.title: No pinch
customer_reviews.text: I love this eye cutler, it works perfect every time I use it. No pinching or eyelash pulling.
customer_reviews.author: corrina b. reyes

customer_reviews.title: will try shu next time. i thought they have ...
customer_reviews.text: will try shu next time. i thought they have the same curl effect. i was supposed to really get shu but got confused with their names.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great curler but missing the refill set
customer_reviews.text: I have thin, fine, straight, blonde eyelashes. I have tried many curlers and I am very happy with this one! It curls my lashes and they stay curled! However, I did not receive the refill set.
customer_reviews.author: Music teacher

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not as sturdy as I thought it to be for the price
customer_reviews.author: Linda L. R.

customer_reviews.title: Fit great
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I've been using for years!!!! BEST eyelash curler and the refills are decently priced. All I can really say is you get what you pay for and these are a must!
customer_reviews.author: wendy w.

customer_reviews.title: Only came with one refill
customer_reviews.text: I like the product but mine only came with 1 refill instead of 2! :(
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Favorite curler, I will never buy another. Provides great curl all day and doesnt pinch or pull lashes.
customer_reviews.author: vanessa juarez

customer_reviews.title: Definitely not what I expected. I thought these were ...
customer_reviews.text: Definitely not what I expected. I thought these were the bomb, but I couldn't even get a tight grip on my lashes.
customer_reviews.author: Jhpmom

customer_reviews.title: Trish McEvoy is by far better than this curler
customer_reviews.text: Eh, Trish McEvoy is by far better than this curler. This one takes me 5 or 6 more squeezes to get the curl I want. Trish McEvoy does it in 1 or 2 squeezes.
customer_reviews.author: Sophie Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: May be a knock off?
customer_reviews.text: This is not the same quality as the exact name brand I bought from Sephora.
customer_reviews.author: PK

customer_reviews.title: the package box was opened and the box for curler ...
customer_reviews.text: the package box was opened and the box for curler was also opened i did not received the original refill and the refill set. dissapointing
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The shape just did not work for me, I ...
customer_reviews.text: The shape just did not work for me, I took the rubber out and put it in my Sephora curler.
customer_reviews.author: Deanne Mathews

customer_reviews.title: Fake curler?
customer_reviews.text: This didn't pinch my eyelids, but it wouldn't curl my lashes. Even the cheapest eyelash curlers I've used at least curled, just pinched a lot of skin. Lashes were only 120 degrees curled after 20-30 seconds of holding. I think this might be fake.
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: Not as great as I thought
customer_reviews.text: Nothing special. I've had better results with a cheaper curler.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Gaynor

customer_reviews.title: Shiseido eyelash curler
customer_reviews.text: This is the first Shiseido item I have purchased and would buy again. Very well made and I hope this product turns out to be a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: phoebe

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product with great value! Very nice seller as well!
customer_reviews.author: lydiali

customer_reviews.title: The best fitting ever
customer_reviews.text: Fits my Asian eye shape perfectly. The best fitting ever.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This is my first Shiseido curler. I love how it fits my whole eye and it doesn't pinch! I bought a Tarte a while ago, and all it does is pinch, pinch, pinch! The Shiseido seems to hold the curl and it curls all of my straight downward lashes.
customer_reviews.author: Ellie's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Not authentic or very bad quality
customer_reviews.text: Cheap and don't seems to be authentic, vey uncomfortable to use
customer_reviews.author: marina

customer_reviews.title: High hopes
customer_reviews.text: I had some really high hopes for this product, but after receiving this product and going to Sephora to see the real one I realized I got a fake one. I have stick straight lashes and this curler barely did anything for them. The curl was lost after 30 minutes. I'm disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Zhou W.

customer_reviews.title: Finally, a quality eyelash curler!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this eyelash curler as a replacement for a Maybelline one that I had been using since high school. This curler does a far superior job at curling my lashes, and without breaking them! I'm definitely happy that I spent a little extra to buy this. It's also really nice to have the extra refills that come with it. The inserts are really high quality so these should last quite a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: I feel upset because I received a defective item. ...
customer_reviews.text: I feel upset because I received a defective item. It doesn't work properly. It is hard to clamp the curler together. It is not smooth when I use it so it occurs a strange sound.
customer_reviews.author: Soo Y.

customer_reviews.title: but works great, and I love that it comes with refills
customer_reviews.text: A little smaller than my previous curler, but works great, and I love that it comes with refills!
customer_reviews.author: Tammy A. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Fake or real? Who cares, this works!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a refill for my Shiseido eyelash curler I had bought several years ago so I decided to pick up this curler/refill combo set for cheap. I was hesitant of the reviews to get this bc it may be fake. Fake or not, it works great! Doesn't matter to me if it is a knockoff or authentic. I have extremely straight Asian hair, eyelashes included. This works thing works amazing. Also, the refills worked perfectly in my original curler that I bought from a department store.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: The Best Instant Curl Ever!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best Eyelash Curler I have ever purchased! With this eyelash curler, you do NOT have to carefully place it on the eye to curl your eyelashes, because it NEVER PINCHES! That is remarkable for me! Secondly, it very quickly curls ALL your lashes. You don't have to repeatedly try to curl them! It instantly curls them! For some unknown reason, that has always been a MAJOR problem for me! Although it does take a long time to receive this Eyelash Curler --- It is ABSOLUTELY worth the extended wait!
customer_reviews.author: Susie

customer_reviews.title: Best eyelash curler I have ever had
customer_reviews.text: I have short asian lashes, and after a horrific experience with another eyelash curler (where 1/3 of my lashes came off), I read the reviews for this pair and bought it. It is just as the other reviewers said. It curls your lashes without tugging and causing eyelash loss. I've used it for many months now, and usually the black little replacement piece (don't know the name of that part) on some of the cheaper curlers I've bought would start having a gash in the middle where the top part of the curler had clamped down on it, this one is still in great shape after a few months of use. Worth the few extra bucks!
customer_reviews.author: Blake B.

customer_reviews.title: Eyelash curler
customer_reviews.text: I bought this eyelash curler for my Asian daughter. She had had a Shu Uemura before but they do not sell refills for it. You have to buy the whole curler all over again. Shiseido does sell refills and my daughter says she likes it even better than the Shu!!!
customer_reviews.author: Marymc

customer_reviews.title: I have large almond shaped eyes so using regular eyelash ...
customer_reviews.text: I have large almond shaped eyes so using regular eyelash curlers has always been a hassle, the curler never curled all of my eyelashes and I used to have to curl my eyelashes 2-3 times just to get all the little hairs. I decided to give this curler a chance and I am so grateful I did! Not only does it curl every single lash, from inner to outer corner but the resulting curl is always very natural looking.
customer_reviews.author: yg

customer_reviews.title: Best eyelash curler ever
customer_reviews.text: This may be the best curler I've ever purchased for its price. I originally purchased this curler from Japan for $7. But since I loved it so much, I decided to pay the extra buck for the same one. It's pricier than what I would want to pay but it came with two extra refills. So it evens out. I have stubborn straight lashes, and this curler does its job! Love love love it.
customer_reviews.author: Yanyi Liang

customer_reviews.title: Not worth $$
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for better curler than others I've used. Have been using Japonesque, which is fairly good, but wanted better. Often pinches my skin, but this Shiseido wasn't any better for the price, I'm sorry to say. I've probably waited too long to return. Oh well...the search is on again.
customer_reviews.author: sweetvickie

customer_reviews.title: The first one was amazing. A little hard to use at first
customer_reviews.text: I don't know which one this is. I bought 2 of these over the past 2 years and got 2 entirely different things. The first one was amazing. A little hard to use at first, but once I got used to it, it did an amazing job with my straight lashes. The 2nd one came and it was very similar to the Shu Uemura curlers that I have.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy in SF

customer_reviews.title: This is not the flatter one for Asian eyes!
customer_reviews.text: This is not the flatter version for Asian eyes. It is simply the shiseido brand of the same eye lash curler you can buy anywhere in the US. GReat quality but not what I thought I was buying.
customer_reviews.author: her

customer_reviews.title: Was amazed at the difference it made as I have Asian ...
customer_reviews.text: Replaced my 40 year old Cover Girl eyelash curler. Was amazed at the difference it made as I have Asian eyes. It seemed to "fit" my eyes much better. Curler refills seem to be of better quality.
customer_reviews.author: areuthere

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Nice coverage for asian eyes and decent lift. I found this curler gentler than others ive bought at the drug store
customer_reviews.author: Pippa

customer_reviews.title: A simple tool for amazing results
customer_reviews.text: Okay, an eyelash curler? Really? Boom! A friend of mine, an amazing make-up artist, taught me a little trick that sent my eyelashes into falsie territory and then recommended this curler. These cushions are rounded and firm so there are no crimps, pulls, or yanks. Between gentle crimps from base to end and this curler, I feel super model fabulous. I've been wearing make-up for years and I'm telling you this little change inspires my glamor even on days I'm not wearing mascara!
customer_reviews.author: J. Lynne

customer_reviews.title: So disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely sucks. Shipping got delayed by 3 days. The product quality is really questionable since it doesn’t do anything. Feels just like the one that I purchased from target and returned. It’s not better than a $3 lash curler. Feels so cheap and weak. I’m not gonna use this. Wish I can get a refund.
customer_reviews.author: KGKG

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for smaller eyes
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for smaller eyes. Never knew their was a difference between eyelash curlers but this this far has worked for my smaller eyes. It does not pinch the lashes in the corner and I am able to get most if not all my lashes in one squeeze.
customer_reviews.author: Lyssa

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for small Asian eyes
customer_reviews.text: I have small Asian yes and this eyelash curler is perfect. Light, small and comes with 2 refills.
customer_reviews.author: FT

customer_reviews.title: Great curls
customer_reviews.text: Comes with extra pads. Has a great angle to catch shorter straight lashes.
customer_reviews.author: Tomi

customer_reviews.title: Fine, I guess.
customer_reviews.text: Honestly? It works a bit, but I'm not super thrilled with it. I don't think there's anything about this that is leaps and bounds over the competition. The price is nice anyway, and it comes with refills, so it's not a waste of money, but it's not going to rock your world.
customer_reviews.author: Alice

customer_reviews.title: Best eyelash curler ever
customer_reviews.text: I have used this brand of curler for decades now. They last a long time, and the refills are the best available - will probably make any curler work better.
customer_reviews.author: DAJ54

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Darn! I typically love all Shiseido products, but this eyelash curler does nothing for me. It does fit better on my Asian eyelids than western lash curlers do, but this doesn't seem to do the trick at all... I have another eyelash curler by Japonesque and I think that one works so much better than this one.
customer_reviews.author: garie

customer_reviews.title: Recommend a quick squeeze (count to 10) and see if ...
customer_reviews.text: Nothing seems to fit my eyes. I was hoping this would do the trick. If and when I am able to get it to fit without pinching it really does curl the lashes, almost too much. Recommend a quick squeeze (count to 10) and see if that is enough. You can always re-do if it isn't.
customer_reviews.author: dktacoma

product_meta.title: Shiseido Eyelash Curler + Refill Set (Original Version)
product_meta.description: Color:Original VersionPackage design was changed. There is no log of the Shiseido on the package. Please contact to the seller if you have concern about package design.
